metadata.title: CVE-2024-28285 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A Fault Injection vulnerability in the SymmetricDecrypt function incryptopp/elgamal.h of Cryptopp Crypto++ 8.9, allows an attacker toco-reside in the same system with a victim process to disclose informationand escalate privileges.

criterions.comment: libcrypto++ package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
